subSubSection.paragraph:
Dorsal shield 297 ( 285–305 ) long and 156 ( 155–158 ) wide; j 1 19 ( 18–20 ), j 3 17 ( 16–18 ), j 4 15 ( 15–16 ), j 5 15 ( 15–16 ), j 6 17 ( 16–20 ), J 2 18 ( 17–20 ), J 5 7 ( 7– 8 ), s 4 29 ( 28–30 ), s 6 31 ( 30–32 ), z 2 16 ( 15–18 ), z 3 21 ( 20– 22 ), z 4 20 ( 19–22 ), z 5 17 ( 16–18 ), Z 4 25 ( 25–26 ), Z 5 41 ( 39–43 ), r 3 27 ( 27–28 ), R 1 17 ( 15–19 ); distances between st 1 -st 3 60 ( 60–61 ), st 2 -st 2 62 ( 60–63 ) and st 5 -st 5 54 ( 50–56 ); ventri-anal shield 97 ( 95–100 ) long, 49 ( 43–55 ) wide at level of ZV 2 and 51 ( 50–53 ) wide at level of anus; JV 5 30 ( 28–32 ); movable cheliceral digit 27 long, with 2 teeth; fixed cheliceral digit 27 ( 26–27 ) long, with 2 teeth; calyx of spermatheca 10 ( 8–11 ) long; St
IV 26
( 25–27 ). Chaetotaxy: genu II 2 , 2/ 0-2 /0, 1; genu III 1 , 2/ 0-2 /0, 1.

Dorsal shield 238 long and 150 wide. Setae j 1 17 , j 3 20 , j 4 13 , j 5 13 , j 6 13 , J 2 12 , J 5 7 , s 4 26 , s 6 22 , z 2 16 , z 3 20 , z 4 20 , z 5 13 , Z 4 20 , Z 5 23 , r 3 18 , R 1 13 ; ventri-anal shield 95 long and 130 wide at the anterior corners; JV 5 16 ; St
IV 24 .
